channel.title: How to make F2P and P2P Worlds with 1 server folder
channel.description: I want to know how to make F2P And P2P Worlds (2 worlds) with just 1 server folder, if MySql is needed, i got it. and also how to make P2P Items Member's-Object in F2P.
